channel.title: Chemistry World Podcast
channel.description: Monthly podcast from Chemistry World, the magazine of the Royal Society of Chemistry.
channel.copyright: This podcast is provided by the Royal Society of Chemistry, and no part may be redistributed without prior permission from chemistryworld@rsc.org
